column2:
"It's not a good idea for Forces to operate on
their own."

"They ought to work together so they can
maximize their potential."

"And the longer they work together, the stronger
they become, bonded by teamwork and
experience."

"So, here's my idea. Let's try building up some
teamwork on the \"Caverns Exploration\" quest."

"*This client order, on which you will have Marlu
accompany you, will be easier to complete if you set
a password in the \"Enter Party Info\" menu and select
the \"Limit multiplayer requests from other parties\"
option when accepting it."
